hint.text: Note that the dome is hollow.

solution.text:
From part (i),
Inner radius of the dome, \(r_i=_{j}_\,m\)
From part (ii),
Outer radius of the dome, \(r_o=_{{j+2}}_\,m\)
Volume of the dome, \(V=\frac23 \pi (r_o^3-r_i^3)\)
\(=\frac23 \pi (_{{j+2}}_^3-_{j}_^3)\)
\(=_{{trunc(((2/Decimal(3))*pi_val*((j+2)**3-j**3)),3)}}_\,m^3\)
Therefore, volume of material required for constructing the dome is \(_{{trunc(((2/Decimal(3))*pi_val*((j+2)**3-j**3)),3)}}_\,m^3\)

content.text: find the volume of material required for constructing the dome.
